project.name: Unit Testing practice project
project.description: Unit Testing practice project serves being dependant on JFree java library, serves the generation and presentation of grades frequencies' chart / histogram. Within the HistogramGenerator java class, readGrades and generateChart methods are being called. The former reads grades as integers, included in a txt file, while the latter, provided with the aforementioned grades, generates the histogram, that being a XYLineChart chart. HistogramGenerator class belongs to the gradeshistogram package. Using Maven build automation tool, compiling code and packaging result to the target dir containing the fat-jar, including the dependencies.
